1.content: You open lazily wake up after a long night partying with your friends and as you open your eyes you instantly blush a deep shade of red as you realize that you're wearing.
1.title: It begins

choices: Pull the outfit off and change into something reasonable
Go to the bathroom and get a better look at yourself in the mirror
Go back to sleep, and hope this is a bad dream
11.content:
Groaning with pain from your massive hangover, your eyes open wide as you look down and see a big maze of fur blocking your vision. You try to sit up, but there is a heavy weight jiggling on your chest, and your head feels like it weighs ten times more than it should. You reach up to push the fluffy weight off your chest, and and see two giant pink fur cuffs wrapped around your wrists, and long pink nails have been attached to your fingers. Sitting up quickly, the weight on your chest grasps your skin and bounces around underneath the fur collar, and you see you've been dressed in a pretty pink dress with ridiculously huge fur trims! A big fluffy petticoat peeks out from under the hem of the skirt, which surrounds your thighs with a big tube of pink fur. Your feet are inside a pair of boots, which have a massive ball of fur exploding around the top of them, surrounding your lower thighs and most of your feet. A pair of lace tights are wrapped tightly around your legs.

"What... what the..." you mumble, trying to stand up, your heavy head flopping back and forth. The dress swishes loudly around as you move, and your peripheral vision is intruded by walls of soft pink hair. You grab it and pull, and feel a painful yank on your scalp. You quickly reach up, and discover why your head feels so heavy - there is a massive fur hat on your head, with an explosion of soft pink hair coming out from under it. Panic grips you as your hands shoot around the hat, feeling the incredible softness of it, the cuffs on your wrists mashing against it as you explore your terrible situation. The hat is puffball shaped, and absolutely gigantic, your arms can barely reach the top of it!

The pain of your hangover begins to fade as panic fills your body. What happened last night?! You think hard, but you can’t remember a thing.

Suddenly, the dress seems very familiar, and the memory of it comes floating through your pounding hangover. A girl you went to high school with wore it one Halloween, it's her dreaded Sexy Poodle costume. She was really into fashion and sewing, and she bragged about how she made it herself with real fur, using old fur coats from the second hand shop that she then cut apart, dyed pink, and re-purposed into a costume. You remember how stupid she looked in it and making fun of her, hurting her feelings, and laughing about it with your friends.

Somehow, it's managed to find its way on your body while you were passed out. You glare at the fluffy prison you’re in, and decide to...
11.title: A Fluffy Pink Poodle Costume

choices: Look in the mirror and see what’s on your face
Bite the bullet, and leave the room to go find a phone
Brave the outdoors, and start walking home
111.content:
The first thing to go is the hat, you think, considering how heavy and hot it is over top of the big curly pink wig you’re wearing. You dig your long glittering nails into the massive thing and pull, but feel a hard grasp inside of it, running all around your scalp. You pull again, and it refuses to budge, the lining is pulling back just as hard on your head. You mash your hands into the thick fluffy volume of it and push and pull the thing around, but it’s secured on your head and won’t budge.

“The hell...” you grunt with your efforts. Pulling on the long curly hair provides the same result, you yank and pull, but all you get is a sharp pain on your head. Somehow, the hat and wig have been stuck to your head with something way stronger than you are.

Mashing your hands into the fur collar, you rip and pull, only to feel the same clinging sensation all around your neck and chest. Ripping and pulling at the poofy skirt is the same, everything is attached to your body with some sort of adhesive that refuses to give at all.

“Dammit!” you curse, trying to pull the big fur boots from your feet. A wave of embarrassment flows through you every time your hands touch the soft luscious fur, which is quite often. You reach around the back of the dress to find a zipper, but the entire thing has been sewn shut, with no openings at all.

Looking around, you realize that you aren’t back at your apartment... it seems like you’re in a hotel room. You scan the room for any sign of your old clothes, but you see nothing. Even your wallet and keys aren’t in sight. The entire room is empty, except for you and your new fluffy pink fashion. The thought of calling your friends for help has been dashed away, since the phone has been removed from the room.

You nervously lick your lips, and taste the strong flavour of candy. You wipe your lips with your hands, but don’t see anything. You spot a small hand mirror left on the nightstand.
111.title: Pull the outfit off!

choices: Attempt a shower to take the make up off.
Check the door, or the hotel room for anything, make up remover perhaps?
Accept the outfit you are wearing and try to leave.
1111.content:
You pick up the mirror terrified of what could possibly be on your face, you are nearly blinded by the sight. Looking back at you, is quite clearly your face, however heavily adorned by make up, your entire face seems to shine, your cheeks permanently blushing from pink make up, you try to rub it off but it is to no avail; finally you notice your eyes, they were applied with the heaviest make up, your eyelashes are huge and curling upwards, around your eyes is a heavy layer of eye shadow in bright pinks and blues, sparkling from the glitter around it. You nearly scream looking at your lips, they are the girliest shade of pink you have seen in your life, licking it again it tastes like cotton candy... On the bright side you would have a whole lot of flavor in your life.

You rush in to the bathroom throwing water on to your face attempting to wash it off, but all that happens is the water becoming a shade of pink, not even any glitter came off. "My friends couldn't have done this..." You mutter, none of them would know the first thing about make up, much less how to apply it with this much tact, or how to make it stay on this well. You curl up in to a ball on the bathroom floor, feeling the skirts poof up brushing against your upper body.
1111.title: Pretty Make up for your pretty dress

choices: Run out of the hotel screaming in terror
Run to the front desk yelling for help
11111.content:
You turn the water on to the shower, and carefully step inside, finding it very hard to balance on tile in heels. The water cascades all over your hat, your outfit, and your face. You quickly grab a face cloth and some soap, and start scrubbing your face hard in the water. Looking in the mirror, you see the same immaculate makeover staring back at you. You try again, scrubbing for several minutes straight, but the water and soap has no effect on your face at all. You pull and yank at the huge hat, but the water hasn’t softened the glue either. Punching the wall in defeat, you leave the shower and stare at the mirror again, your whole outfit is soaking wet and dripping all over the floor.

Suddenly, your outfit begins to feel tight. VERY tight. The hat squeezes your head, and the collar pushes against your neck and chin. Of course, you try to pry yourself free, but everything is on even tighter than before. Then the outfit does something amazing - it soaks up the water it’s been drenched in, and sucks it into itself, and is suddenly dry again. Your heavily made up eyes are wide in shock as the fluffy boots you’re wearing do the same to the floor, pulling all of the water into themselves until the whole room is dry.

Before you can react to anything, the outfit loosens its back to a comfortably unremovable gasp, and every bit of fur ripples, fluffs, and shakes itself up larger than it had been before. Your heels slowly raise themselves an inch, the fur on the boots becomes thicker, and the hat’s ridiculous size increases even more. Twice as much hair is now swishing out from under your fluffy hat, the pom poms swell in size, and you scream as the big fake breasts plump themselves up underneath the dress.

Your crinolines swish around as they become more voluminous, and the fur trim of your skirt flounces as it gains mass from its watery meal.

You stare at the mirror in horror. You didn’t think things could get worse, but they definitely have. The outfit is even fluffier than it had been moments ago, you almost look like a caricature of your previous self. You turn from the mirror and teeter out of the bathroom, your stomach sick with the soft heavy sensations your ensemble is returning to you. The hat and collar have gotten big enough to fluff their thick fur around your face enough to give you tunnel vision; everywhere you look has a sparkling fluffy pink frame to it.

Panic overtakes you, and you decide to...
11111.title: Attempt a shower to take the make up off.

choices: Rational enough (slow down and reach the far door safely)
Too panicked (slip and fall into the pool)
111111.content:
You run out of the door, all pretenses of secrecy abandoned in your panic. Unfortunately, this hotel is unfamiliar to you. It shares the same basic design that all hotels have, but the small differences are what counts. Such as where the exit is.

Running in a random direction, you glimpse a sign indicating stairs. Taking the indicated left turn, you sail onto the staircase, miraculously not tripping on your ridiculous heels. The different floors become indistinguishable from one another, each level blending together into a pink fur edged continuation. The sound of your screaming and heels clacking echoes throughout the stairwell.

Finally, you reach the bottom floor and quickly push open the doors... which disastrously lead to the hotels indoor pool.

In your screaming panicked state, are you still rational enough to realize you should slow down and be careful, or does the pool not even register in your mind as you continue running towards the far door marked "Exit"?
111111.title: Run out of the hotel screaming in terror

choices: Head out into the lobby and see what's happening to all the guests
Climb out of the pool and leave, its every "man" for himself
1111112.content:
Rational thought is the last thing in your head right now as you blast through the doors and into the indoor pool room. You try to pivot and avoid falling in, but your heel sleeps and your arms flail wildly, desperately trying to grab onto something but only finding empty air. You fly head over high heels into the deep end with a massive SPLASH, and hold your breath as you try to keep yourself afloat. The huge fur prison you're wearing makes it absolutely impossible to swim, and you find yourself slowly sinking to the bottom.

"MMMM!" you grunt, kicking your legs as you sink deeper and deeper. Suddenly being spotted in public wearing a pink fur outfit doesn't seem so bad, now that you're about to painfully drown in a hotel pool. But... aren't you sinking? Why isn't the surface of the water getting further away from you? Is the pool draining...

Oh no. Just as it did in the shower, you see your outfit starting to swell up. It can't possibly soak up the entire pool, can it? Turns out that... Yes! It can! In a matter of jaw dropping moments you're screaming as your head breaks the surface of the water, and a massive wall of pink fur at least thirty feet in every direction has encased you. Huge waves of pink hair stretch out in every direction, and the fake breasts must be several tons each as they rest on the floor of the now empty pool, and you slowly bounce and sway in the middle of the pink nightmare.

You want to scream for help, but know that there's absolutely no way you can explain this situation to anyone, and it'll likely take people a long time to accept your appearance as reality. It won't be long before someone comes in and sees you anyway, so what's the point? A sigh escapes your lips and you exhale in defeat, and as you exhale you feel yourself descending to the floor. Wait... is the outfit draining the water back out? Did it somehow detect you were in distress, and is actually going to let you loose? Glancing around, you can't see anything except for pink fur, pink hair, and long streams of both shooting out into the pool drain. You watch the pink river slurp its way into the hotel's plumbing system, as well as finding its way into the poolside bathroom where it forces its way into the faucets and shower drains. This continues until you feel your feet on the floor again, and you stumble to regain your balance, and feel somewhat relieved that you'll soon be free to flee the building and never come back. That is until the river of fur and hair snap away from you, sending you jiggling and bouncing back with momentum as they flee down the drain and vanish.

Looking over yourself, you're just as garish as you were when you first fell in the pool. You yell angrily as you grab and pull at the huge breasts but everything is still cemented on tight, just as it was before. Your futile struggle is interrupted by a sudden chorus of screams from all over the hotel. The sound of doors open, furniture breaking, and general panic has given you a pretty good idea of where the several tons of fur, hair, fake flesh, and glam from your outfit has gone.
1111112.title: Too panicked (slip and fall into the pool)

choices: They are being controlled by the hair
They see you as a queen
11111121.content:
You struggle your way out of the pool and to the door that leads into the lobby. You open it and are shocked. There is pink hair and fur literally everywhere and it seems alive! You watch as the pink hair and fur spreads like vines across the lobby entangling people along the way. You watch in horror as people entangled by the fur and hair disappear.
Just as you thought it couldn’t get worse, it does. The people who were consumed by the hair and fur start to submerge again but in the same costume as you! One after one people in pink poodle costumes climb their way out from the hair and fur wearing the same thing you are.
You assumed that people would start freaking out but they’re just standing there. As you look around you notice that they are all looking at you. You feel creeped out as there’s are maybe twenty people in poodle costumes all looking at you. You realize that...
11111121.title: Head out into the lobby and see what's happ...

choices: Wait for the next elevator to show up
Try heading to a friends house for help
111112.content:
A scream of pure horror comes from your glossy lips as you stagger toward the door, the new thickness of the fur on your outfit swaying heavily with every step you take. You open the door and stumble into the hallway, desperately looking around for the elevator, your vision obscured on all sides by pink sparkling fur. You start heading down the hall, and hear a loud ding in the direction you're heading. You see the elevator doors open, and two girls in their late teens step out. They stop dead in their tracks and stare at you wide eyed. You stop walking, your eyes lock, and they burst into laughter.

"Oh my GOD! It worked! I can't believe it worked!" one of them laughs, covering her mouth with her hands.
"I knew it would!" the other cries out. "I knew it would, but didn't know how WELL it would work! This is better than anything I could've hoped for!"

They burst into hysterics, pointing and laughing at your incredibly gaudy and fluffy pink getup. Sweat forms on your brow as you burn with embarrasment.

"What... what is this?" you yell out, grabbing at the maze of crinolines and fur in front of you. "What did you do to me?!"

"Nothing that you didn't deserve!" one of them sneers. "I'm sure everyone at the bar last night would agree, and would be excited to see what happens when you cross the line!"

Your breath quickens as you frantically try to remember what you did, but everything past last afternoon is a blank.

"Please, I'm sorry!" you blurt out, tears forming in your immaculately made over eyes. "I don't remember what I did, but I'm sorry!"

"Of course you don't remember," one of the girls says, grinning evilly. "We wiped your memory."

"Wha..." you stammer. "How? WHY!"

"Well, we don't think your punishment would be great enough if you knew WHY you were receiving it!" The girls laugh together, again looking at how ridiculous you look. "We'd rather see you stumbling around like a scared lost little sissy, getting what she deserves without ever knowing why! Don't worry, I'm sure you'll find a way out of it, if you ever remember why you're there in the first place!" The girls back into the elevator suddenly, and the doors begin to close.

"WAIT!" you yell out, moving toward them, but the last you see of them is their hysterical laughter as the doors close shut. You mash the button, but the elevator is already going back down to the lobby. You stare bewildered at the closed doors, then back down at your massive crinolined dress, and the huge fur collar and trim which surrounds you, tickling the tiny bit of your face that isn't surrounded by the huge pink fur ball. You pull and yank at your outfit again, finding its still clinging tight to every inch of your skin.

You decide to...
111112.title: Run to the front desk yelling for help

choices: Run toward them and stop them before they drive away
Go to the hotel's main reception and see if you can call a friend to help
11112.content:
In a panic, you look through the cabinets in the bathroom hoping to find a complimentary bottle of makeup remover. You try your hardest to avoid looking in the big mirror, but you still see your giant fur hat bobbing and swaying as you continue your search, and the big pink pom poms hanging from either side of your face constantly swing and bump against you, a neverending reminder of how ridiculous you look right now. You go through the entire bathroom, but there's nothing even close to make up remover in the room.

You mince back into the main room, and decide to check the nightstand. Bending over is a challenge, as the big breasts trapped within your costume are constantly throwing you off balance, not to mention your big fur hat and wig have added several extra pounds to your head as well. You move the pink hair away from your face and open the drawers, your stomach sinking at the sight of the empty night stand, as well as the massive pink cuff surrounding your waist. You give several frustrated tugs at your outfit again before getting back to your feet, teetering on your tall heels.

Knowing that eventually you'll have to leave the room before room service shows up, you open the door and peek down the hallway. The corridor is empty, so you peek in the opposite direction and see someone watching you at the end of the hall. You can't quite place it, but they look vaguely familiar, and they seem to recognize you as well. They give you a menacing smile before bolting down the stairwell.

"Hey!" You out, stepping into the hallway. The door slams and locks itself behind you, and you realize there's no turning back now. You take tiny steps down the hallway, your skirts and crinolines noisily rustling against each other, and your heels clicking loudly. Going down the stairs takes ages, as you constantly feel like you're about to topple over and break your neck. Not that a fall would hurt much anyway, you think, considering how much cushioning you've been encased in.

You make it out the door at the bottom of the stairwell and see the person sitting in the drivers seat of a van. They are smiling at you as they start the engine.

Be diplomatic
111121.content:
The lady in the car keeps her smile as she slowly starts to drive away, angrily you chase after her in the only way you can, holding up your skirts so you don't trip, and still moving slowly. After a few minutes of chasing after the van moving under the speed limit it stops abruptly in front of you, you try to stop but only end up spraining your ankle as you trip, hitting your head against the front of the car you black out for a moment.

You wake up with a moan as you feel the world moving around you, or are you moving on it, everything is blurry for a second, that was one crazy dream you had just had. You go to sit upright to only hurt your neck as you lurch back downwards... what was around your neck? The fur around the collar of your pretty dress seems to have gotten thicker, in fact it has, around your neck is now a dog collar of the ugliest pink fur you have ever seen, attached to a handle on a door, you now realize where you are, you are in the back of the van you were chasing after. Unable to see your captor you hear a familiar voice being thrown at you.

"Do you still hate my dress?" A sniffling voice acts.

"WHAT DO YOU WANT FROM ME" You angrily shout at the girl, as a response you hear crying... after a moment the crying turns in to a sadistic laugh.
111121.title: Run toward them and stop them before they drive...

choices: Right in the middle of your high school reunion!
The downtown bar district, and it’s a busy Friday night!
1111211.content:
The girl’s laughing sends you into a rage.

“What did you do to me?!” you scream out, trying to keep balance as she swerves around corners at high speed. “What did you do?”

“Back in high school, I wanted to make something that would really make me stand out from everyone else in the Fashion Club. Everyone was making the same dresses and the same outfits, but I knew how to out do them all!”

The van swerves again, the fluffy hat swishes with the momentum.

“I was working at the second hand store back then, and a BIG donation of fluffy fur coats came in. They were all in pretty rough shape, but there was enough unspoiled fur to make something incredible - like a phoenix rising from the ashes!”

You grit your teeth, your body burning hot under the fur collar.

“After I had cut, dyed, and sewed my dream together, I couldn’t wait to show it off at school! I got barely any sleep the night before, thinking about how cute and fluffy I’d be, with the rest of the girls looking frumpy clones of each other. I still remember the gasps and smiles I saw when I bounced through the front doors! Everything was going as planned, until...”

You see her punch the steering wheel, the horn blasting through the empty streets. The van begins to accelerate even faster.

“You. YOU. You just HAD to walk by me and mock me. You just HAD to ruin my day, my ONE. DAY.”

You gulp under the bulging collar.

“Do you remember what you said?”

You shake your head, the big hat sways as a reminder of your current appearance.

“You said, and I quote - ‘Nice outfit.’”

You knit your glittering brows in confusion. “Wait... ‘nice outfit’? Is that what this is all about? Seriously?! What is the...”

“It was the most sarcastic, demeaning thing I have ever been a victim of!” She screams out, slamming on the breaks. “Nice outfit?! “NICE” OUTFIT?! Well, I figured since you thought it was such a ‘nice outfit’, you’d want to see how nice it was, give it your own personal test drive!”

The van has stopped. She moves past the front seat into the back of the van, and begins petting you like a dog.

“See how nice and fluffy your hat is? That’s an entire coat’s worth of fox fur, dyed a delicious baby pink. The pom poms were made from the big cuffs on each of the sleeves! Isn’t it so cuddly and warm?”

She giggles, stroking the outfit. You are terrified, this girl is psycho.

“Don’t you love how cute and poofy the dress is? I designed it myself! How can someone NOT pay attention to someone in such a cute outfit? Why would ANYONE want to hurt someone’s feelings when they’re glamorous enough to pull such a daring look off?! Maybe it’s because you were jealous, maybe you always wanted to look pretty in pink fur... well, now’s your big day! Time for you to...”

Her voice becomes faint and muffled and the world goes dark as a very thick bag is pulled over your hat and head. Your face is squished in a tight prison of fur, the smell of your makeup and perfume invades your nose stronger than before. You hear the leash unbuckle from the side of the van, and the door opens. A strong yank pulls you out the door, and big arms quickly grab you and stand you on your heels. You are quickly dragged by two people on either side of you, and your muffled screams go unheeded, with the laughter of the girl becoming more and more distant as you’re carried away from the van.

After several minutes of muffled sounds coming and going, and being pushed against several doors to open them, the bag is pulled from your head, the fur hat expanding and exploding out from its prison, and you squint your heavily made up eyes as they adjust to the light.

It doesn’t take long to see you’re...
1111211.title: Yell at the girl angrily

choices: Squish into the elevator, ignoring the girls taunts and insults
Wait for the next elevator
1112.content:
Knowing that you won't be able to sit around in the hotel room forever, you decide the best option is to leave and find a way to contact a friend. Of course, it's entirely possible that your friends are up to this, and are waiting for you to call so they can laugh at your predicament. Regardless of who is behind all of this, you teeter on your heels, and open the door, heading out into the hall.

The door close behind you, and locks. You look both ways down the hall, which is thankfully empty. You mince around, looking for a courtesy phone somewhere, but the only things you find are an ice machine, and a vending machine. If you want to call your friends, you're going to have to do so from the lobby of the hotel.

Grumbling with rage, you make your way to the elevator and hit the call button. Moments later, the elevator dings and the doors swing open - revealing a crowd of bubbly teenage girls, who immediately stop chattering to each other once they see you. A few painful moments of silence pass like an eternity, which is broken by their shrill shrieks of laughter - laughter loud enough to wake up anyone sleeping in a three floor radius.

"Oh my GOD!" one of them yells out. "Oh... my.. GAWD!"
"What IS that? HAHA!"

You lower your head, hoping the big fur hat and collar cover enough of your face to avoid this humiliation. You don't dare risk taking the stairs, since you can barely manage to stay standing in your heeled boots, and you know that even if you wait for the next elevator, these girls are going to be waiting for you in the lobby.
1112.title: Bite the bullet, and leave the room to go find ...

choices: Stay in the elevator with the girls
Run out of the elevator, hoping the guys help you
11121.content:
Knowing that you're going to have to put up with a lot of humiliation and insults for the rest of the day, you might as well get used to it right here and now. You cram into the elevator with the girls, who all laugh as the big fluffy skirt squishes up against them, and your hat starts brushing and tickling the sides of their faces.

"Oh my gawd! He's coming with us!"
"What a cute little thing! NOT!"

The girls babble and giggle, and the doors close. Noting the floor, you see that you have twelve more to go before you're at the lobby.

"So, where did you get an outfit like that? Seems expensive!"

One of the girls starts rubbing the back of your hat, and you try pulling away from her, only to mash into another girl - who grabs a hold of your big fake breasts.

"Leave me alone!" you growl, pushing her hands away from you. You feel the thick fur trim of the skirt being lifted from behind you, followed by a chorus of giggles. You grab your skirt and pull it down over your legs.

"Hey, you're the one who put together such a pretty outfit, aren't you happy that we're admiring it?"

"I didn't put this on! Someone dressed me like this and left me here!" you snap back.

"Really? I find that hard to believe! How could someone manage to dress you like that while you're asleep, WITHOUT waking you up? There's no way!"

"Yeah!" another girl chimed in. "Admit it, this is your outfit!"

"I want to try on your hat!" A pair of hands grab the big fur abomination on your head and start pulling, which jerks your head around painfully.

"Stop it!" you yell out, trying to push the girl away. "It's stuck on me!"

"Stuck?" the girls all grab a hold of your hat and yank. An incredible amount of pain is the result, and the hat stays put on your head.

"Omigod, this is so weird!" The girls laugh, and one of them takes an apprehensive yank at your collar. She laughs as you try to pull away from her, and wind up squishing against the girls behind you.

"Hah! Maybe he's telling the truth! Maybe he pissed off the wrong girls, and they got him back GOOD!"

"Is that true? Are you some cheating asshole who got what he deserved?"

The tone of the girls' voices has slowly taken a nasty turn. You look at the floor number, you're only at 8. The elevator is moving at a snail's pace.

"Oh, hang on," one of the girls says as she runs her hands down the whole row of buttons, causing every floor to light up. "I think we need to spend a little more time with our new friend here..."

You gulp, the girls begin snickering The door opens up, revealing a group of big burly guys, who stop talking with each other and stare at you in shock.

"Sorry boys, this elevator is full!" One of the girls laughs, reaching to press the 'close door' button. You...
11121.title: Squish into the elevator, ignoring the girls ta...

choices: The cab takes you downtown to the bar district
The girls whisper something to the cab driver, and he starts driving...
111211.content:
You avoid making eye contact with the group of guys, who are staring at you and filling the hallway with hoots and hollers. They try to insult you, but they are in hysterics and are practically crying from laughter, which is slowly silenced as the elevator doors close. The girls ensure things don’t stay quiet, and start picking up where the guys left off.

“So then beautiful, what’s your plan for tonight? All dressed up and nowhere to go?”

The other girls laugh, and you feel them poking you in the back and sides as they snicker. You flinch but don’t bother trying to move away; considering how tight quarters the elevator is you’ll just wind up pressed up against someone else.

“Well, it’d be a SHAME to have such a pretty outfit go to waste!” one of the girls sneers as she rubs the back of your collar. “I think we need to show our new friend here off a bit!”

You don’t like where this is going, and start trembling in your fluffy heels. It’s getting awfully hot in the elevator, and it’s taking forever to make its way to the lobby. All you want is to get home and figure things out, but these girls clearly have different plans for you.

“What do you say? Want to have some fun on the town tonight? I bet lots of guys would just love to...”

“No!” you finally blurt out, pushing the girls as far away from you as you can, which turns out to be only a foot in either direction. “Please... please just let me go home. I don’t deserve this, and have no idea...”

“Exactly! You have NO idea why you’re stuck like this! How do you know you don’t deserve this? For all you know, you could be getting off lightly!” One of the girls hooks her arm around yours and grips it tight, and another girl does so on the other side. You see that the elevator has finally slowed to a halt, and the doors open wide to the lobby. The girls easily overpower any attempt you make at staying in the elevator, as you’re pulled forward by the girls on either side and pushed from the girls behind you. Time seems to stand still as the huge room goes quiet, the only sound is your heels clicking loudly on the floor as you struggle to keep up. Slowly, one by one, you hear the crowd around you breaking into laughter, and see phones being raised in your direction, flashing and recording your humiliation. Some people aren’t as happy as others to see a huge pink fluffy drag queen making their way past them, and hurl insults after you.

“Oh, don’t listen to them! They’re just jealous at the idea of how much fun you’re going to have!” one of the girls says. “Just think, the night is young! We have hours of dancing and flirting ahead of us!”

The girls burst into laughter again, and you decide to stop resisting them and start trying to keep up, otherwise you’re going to lose your footing and fall flat on your face. 1121.content:
You reach down and rip the note from the lid of the toilet seat, and hold it in front of you, your long glittery nails coming into full view.

"Good morning, sunshine!

No doubt you've discovered the pretty ensemble that I've put together for you, one that you saw fit to ridicule me for wearing back in high school. I never forgot the horrible things you said to me, and over time I realized that maybe you were a little jealous of how pretty I looked, and always wanted to be a pretty pink poodle girl yourself. Good news, that day has come, cutie!

You're probably a little guilty that you look so much more gorgeous than I did in my outfit, and have already tried to rip it off for some silly reason. I don't want you missing out on how fun it is showing the world how pretty you are, so I attached everything to you with a very special adhesive, one that I've been developing at the university lab for the past several years. The adhesive needs to be dissolved with a special remover, one that I have set aside in a special location for you, a place where you'll be able to show off how pretty you've become!

Here's where the fun begins! As the day goes on, the thick layer of adhesive I’ve applied is going to cure and harden between the outfit and your skin, and it will send tiny little microscopic tendrils into the outfit, filling every nook and cranny of your costume, hair, and makeup with a network of fibers, all amazingly flexible while being stronger than titanium. This makes sure you’ll never be able to ever cut the costume off, I’d hate for you to ruin all my hard work!

The best part about this? The microscopic fibres of the adhesive will also seep down through your skin and into your muscles, and eventually your bones. Don't worry, although there are millions of these tiny strands, they're so thin that your body won't even know they're there. Even as your skin grows and sheds, these tiny strands will stay put in your body, and once the adhesive finally sets... it's there for good! Not even the remover will be able to break it down, you'll get to live the rest of your life looking like a pretty fluffy pink poodle girl! Imagine how jealous everyone will be!

I'm sure that you're excited at that idea, but just in case you'd like to be able to walk around in public ever again without making a scene everywhere you go, I've left the remover in a special location. You'll have to follow my little treasure hunt if you're ever going to find it, the first clue is taped to the door at the end of the hall outside your room.

And if you DON'T want to take that outfit off and change back into your boring old boy clothes, just wait another four hours, and the glue will set permanently, and you'll be the fluffy pink poodle girl that you've always wanted to be... FOREVER!

Hugs and kisses,

K"

Your lower the note, feeling sick and lightheaded, the reality of your situation sinking in. The idea of being trapped in this costume for the rest of your life has made you faint, and you grab the edge of the counter to keep yourself from falling to the floor in shock. The huge pom poms hanging from the hat swing around and bounce against the sides of your face as you stop yourself from falling, and the big breasts bounce merrily under the massive fur collar. You look down over the big collar atop the fake breasts, seeing the crinolines swishing under your skirt, and the bulging cuffs of pink fur wrapped around your heeled boots. No matter where you look, some part of the ridiculous costume makes its way into your vision, and the massive hat weighs heavily on your head, bulging out in all directions with soft sparkly fur.

You know that you need to get out of this outfit, NOW. Again, you rip and pull at all parts of it, but the fact that it refuses to budge at all lends credibility to the note. You remember now, it was Katherine who had worn the costume to school, and you definitely laid into her with enough insults to send her to a therapist for several years. You swallow hard, realizing that she’s spent many years devising this revenge, and you pray you can find a way out of this before the outfit becomes your permanent home.

With only four hours to go, you cautiously make your way through the room, teetering on your heels, and peek out the door. Sure enough, you can see a piece of paper taped to the door at the end of the hall. You figure that you can follow her directions, which will most likely be a gauntlet of embarrassment, or wager that she’s bluffing, and find your own way out of this with the help of a friend.

The idea of an adhesive making an outfit indestructible and permanently bonded to your body is just too far fetched, and you decide its time to brave the hallways and head to reception to call a friend. You teeter on your heels and swish your way down the hall, into the elevator, and out into the main lobby. Time seems to freeze as everyone gets a good look at you, and laughter slowly erupts amongst the crowd. You mince your way to the front desk and ask the giggling receptionist if you can use the phone. After an hour of sitting in the lobby, hiding your face with the thick wig spilling out from under your fluffy hat, your friend arrives. You glare at him, and fill him in with the details of the note and what had been done to you as you both walk precariously to the car. He laughs, rubs the fluffy fur ball that’s encasing the top of your head, and comments on the amazing job the pranksters have done on you, and how its the best prank he’s ever seen. You get into his car, the huge puffball of a hat making it difficult to sit upright in the seat, as its massive volume is compacting as much as it can against the top of your head and the roof of the car. Again you hide your face with the thick walls of hair as he drives you home.

Once your friend has helped you break into your house due to your lack of a backup key, he wishes you luck and drives off. You breathe a sigh of relief, finally free of the public humiliation you’ve received at the hotel, as well as during the drive home, where people were shouting all manners of names at the pink fluffy drag queen they saw in the car beside them. Your feet are in an incredible amount of pain from being crammed in the heeled boots for so long, and the entire costume has become uncomfortably hot from the small amount of walking you’ve had to do. The entire experience has left you drained, so you stumble over to the sofa and collapse on the cushions, your fluffy hat and collar making an excellent pillow as you doze off to sleep.

Several hours later, sunlight begins streaming in through your windows and you awake with a start. Blinking your eyes, you remember fragments from the horrible dream you were having last night, something about being trapped in some sort of ridiculous...

Considering how bright, big, and glittery your costume is, it only takes a few seconds for the reality of the situation to come crashing back to you. You struggle off the couch and swish your way into the kitchen to find a way out of your pink fluffy prison. Opening a drawer and grabbing the sharpest knife you can find, you start sawing madly at the hot furry ball atop your head. The knife zips across the fur, stabs into it harmlessly, and zips right off again. You freeze, and try again, stabbing hard into the soft mound of fur. Again, the knife squishes into the hat, but refuses to puncture the lining or even make a scratch in it. You turn your attention to the collar around your neck, but the same thing happens, the knife won’t slice any of it off, not even a single hair of the fur comes loose. Your heart beats faster as you stab at the dress with the knife, and watch it harmlessly glance off.

Stepping as quickly as you can into your garage, you grab the closest tool you can find - which is a circular saw. You turn it on and blindly drive it down into the skirts surrounding your legs. A scream comes from your lips as sparks fly off from the dress, you shut off the saw and see not a single scratch on the fabric. You turn the saw back on and press it against your breasts, and they jiggle and shake as the saw grinds against them, and suddenly the blade overheats and breaks, sending fragments of metal flying into your face and costume. The shards bounce harmlessly off of your costume, and frighteningly enough, off of your pretty made over face.

Your breathing becomes very shallow, to the point of hyperventilation, and you race back to the kitchen, ripping and pulling at the heavy fur monster atop your head. Before you descend into a futile attempt at yanking the outfit from your body, you see a card sitting on the kitchen table. You race over to it and see in glittering letters on the front, above a picture of yourself unconscious in your ridiculous costume:

“Congrats on becoming a fluffy poodle girl!”

Your hands tremble as you open the card and read the flowing handwriting within.

“So you’ve decided that you love my outfit so much, that you’d like to keep it forever! Who can blame you? You look SO pretty, and will for the rest of your life! I bet you can’t WAIT to strut your way around the city, showing off how pretty you’ve become! Most guys would think this was a horrific nightmare, but I am SO jealous of your courage to be as pretty as you’ve always wanted to be! I’m glad I could help you make your pink fluffy dreams come true!

I’m heading out of the country permanently, so I’m afraid I’ll never get to see how adorable you look in person. Don’t worry, I’m sure I’ll find tons of photos online taken of you in public from jealous onlookers. Aren’t you excited at how much attention you’re going to get? I know I am! I wish I could look in the mirror every morning for the rest of my life and see something as cute and fluffy as you staring back at me!

Just remember, this isn’t a dream! It’s a dream come true!

Love,

K”

The card drops to the floor from your hands. You stare at the wall for a very long time, and eventually make your way to the bathroom, and stare into the mirror. The hat, hair, and collar frame your gaudy face with glittering pink fur. The massive breasts quiver with your shallow breaths, and the big pom poms rest against them. The heeled boots, thick with fur, are still cramping your feet, and the big rustling skirt never seems to stop moving and swishing against your legs.

You spend the rest of the night screaming and pulling at the outfit. Every power tool in your garage winds up breaking against it. You race from room to room, the sensations of the fluffy costume building as you do so, the heavy hat wobbling your head back and forth, the fluffy trim constantly brushing your skin, the pom poms bouncing madly with your movements. This goes on for several days, until you finally collapse from exhaustion.

Laying on the floor, you read the card beside you over and over again, until you fade into sleep, and the words echo through your mind.

Just remember, this isn’t a dream! It’s a dream come true!

You realized that you were in the shipping and receiving room of the Dolly Wolly mega toy store in the mall. They made the most popular dolls on the market, bumping the famous Barbie to second place as they were very lifelike and came with a nearly endless number of accessories. You had avoided the store like the plague as, due to an illness you were born with, you never grew more than a mere three feet tall. "Yay! You're awake!" giggling, a familiar voice said.

You turned to find Anna, your 16 year old sister. She was towering, compared to you, at 5-foot six inches with long brown hair and green eyes. Although your sister and parents, for the most part, was very protective of you, they were also very fun loving and took every opportunity to have some fun with you. "Why am I dressed like a Dolly Wolly in the backroom of the toy store!?" whispering, you angrily demanded.

"Don't blow a gasket, sweetie." came another voice.

You turned to find your mom, a near mirror image to your sister, smiling warmly at you. "Mom, please!" begging, you whispered. "Why are you doing this to me!?"

Mom gave a patient sigh. "I guess we do owe you an explanation." looking at you, she said. "You see, I have been promoted to the head of research for the Dolly Wolly company and they need me to do a field test on their 'Real Baby' line of clothing, products, and accessories."

"That would mean countless of hours of work for mom." chiming in, Anna said. "Finding families willing to try the Dolly Wolly products on their infants and toddlers, waiting for their responses." she sighed as well. "It will keep mom away from home like forever and, with dad overseas on business..."

"However, you are the exact same size as the 'Baby Dolly Wolly' dolls I need to do my research on." smiling excitedly, mom said. "With you as the 'model', I can do everything at home with help from Anna and her friends."

Your eyes went wide as saucers, turning ten shades of red from embarrassment. Mom was planning to subject you to every 'Baby Dolly Wolly' product and accessory that the company had geared for real babies! You quickly shook your head and began to protest but Anna shoved a large pacifier into your mouth. Four hands grabbed you from behind as she then buckled the belt like ribbon, around your neck. Judging from the high pitched giggling, you guessed they were Anna's friends from school.

"This is the latest technology in pacifiers." smiling, Anna said. "It comes apart in the front to allow us to feed 'baby' her bottle while keeping her silent and calm."

Again, you tried to protest but the pacifier effectively gagged you so you merely glared at your sister and mom before the two giggling girls dragged you over to a large box. Seeing it, you realized that it was a 'Baby Dolly Wolly' box and turned back to mom and Anna, desperately shaking your head.

"I know you think poorly of us right now, dear." softly, mom said. "Believe me, you are being a great help." she then giggled. "We'll try to make this a fun experience."

"For me or you?" struggling, you thought.

With your ridiculous small size, you were no match for the two giggling teenage girls as they used the heavy wire ties to tightly secure you inside the 'Baby Dolly Wolly' box. As the lid was placed over you and taped shut, mom appeared into your field of vision. "Don't worry, sweetie, you're not going to be sold." smiling, she said. "You will be marked as 'not for sale' but you will be on display for the day to mark the new advertizing campaign for the dolls."

With that, you felt yourself being lifted and carried into the store....

You did not hear the whispered conversation between Mia and Anna. Had you did, you might not have been as frightened when you heard Ms Tanner wanting a picture with Anna's 'Baby Doll'. The picture was taken and Mia waved good bye to Anna before she continued to push you along until the next person paused to look at you and whisper with Anna and, of course, take another picture. "This is unbearable!" fighting tears, you thought. "For Pete's sake, sis, feed me something!"

Eventually, Anna reached the far end of the park where there were few people around and looked out to the road that lead towards home. "It took longer than I thought to get here." hiding her worry, she said. "I have less than five minutes to get Cire home before mom gives me the doll treatment." she shuddered, imagining herself in a diaper and over sized baby dress. "I'll be in equally deep trouble when mom finds out I didn't feed the 'baby'."

She sighed, pondering over what to do....

Deciding it was best to get you home quickly, Anna pushed the stroller with you in it towards home. "Not to worry, baby." teasing, she said. "Mommy and I will feed you the moment we get home."

You were crying by the time Anna pushed you through the front door to find mom placing your television into a storeroom before closing and locking the door with a key. She turned and froze, seeing you looking at her with tears in your eyes as you shook your head. "I'm sorry, dear." sighing, she said. "I promise you will get everything back when this is over." she then turned to Anna. "Did you feed baby Cire?"

"I kept getting stopped by people, wanting to talk." defensively, Anna said. "They all think Cire looked adorable..."

Mom grabbed Anna by the arm and pulled her out of earshot. "Cire is a human being, modeling baby products, Anna." whispering, mom scolded. "He is not a lifeless play doll!"

"I know that." wincing, Anna quietly replied. "You wanted to show off the new Dolly Wolly products and accessories, this was the fastest and most fun way I could think of..."

"Do you think this is a game!?!" furious, mom whispered. "Once word hits the press that Cire is the model for the new Dolly Wolly baby products, we will be under the microscope of every child rights group in the area!"

"I- I didn't think of that." looking worried, Anna whispered.

Mom sighed. "Look, I agree we need to show off the outfits and accessories, meaning a lot of outings with Cire suffering public scrutiny and embarrassment." giving you a quick glance, she whispered. "However, this is serious business with big rewards if we do this right and bigger consequences if we screw up!"

"So, what do we do?" uncertain, Anna asked. "The baby needs to be fed."

Mom sighed then walked back to you, still trapped in the stroller. "Let's get you fed and ready for a map." smiling at you, she said. "It's been a long day for you." With that, mom pressed the release button, freeing you from the stroller and carried you into the dinning room where she fed you...

Just as Sarah had said, the front of the pacifier came off, removing the nipple from my mouth before mom thrust the nipple of the bottle in its place, holding it there as you took in the much needed drink of milk. It was humiliating and degrading to you to be forced to drink from a bottle like a real baby but you guessed it was all a part of mom's research. Once you were done, mom removed the bottle and thrust the front of the pacifier back into place, gagging you once more.

"Did baby Cire enjoy her bottle?" teasing, mom asked. she then turned serious. "Did it taste alright?"

You shrugged, more embarrassed than annoyed before feeling the need to burp. Only, when you did, you discovered that the pacifier gag did not allow any room for liquids to seep through, just air and you began to choke on your own spit up! Mom, seeing you begin to convulse, immediately knew the problem and quickly unbuckled the pacifier gag, allowing you to spit up and cough before falling into tears. "I'm so sorry, Cire." patting you on the back as you coughed, she whispered. "All new devices have a flaw, that is why I needed you to do the research on instead of real babies." she then smiled. "You just saved the Dolly Wolly company millions of dollars in lawsuits."

Before you could respond, mom thrust a new pacifier into your mouth and firmly secured it into place with a Velcro strap rather than a buckle. "Give me a break!" crying, you thought. "Don't I get any say in this!?"

"This model of pacifier has the holes needed to allow spit up to seep through without blocking the airways." patting you on the head, mom explained. "Only it fills the mouth so crying and, in your case, speaking is impossible." she smiled picking you up. "Let me show baby her new room for the year."

She sighed, seeing your pleading expression. She knew you did not like this and decided to try to find some form of compensation. The only issue was she did not know what that would be as she carried you into your new room.

1321212111.content:
Mom sighed seeing your hurt expression. "I know you think poorly of me, dear." Softly, she said. "I will explain things in a little more detail for you."

You crossed your arms as mom sat down in a rocking chair with you in her lap. "This aught to be good." Unimpressed, you thought.

"The reason I am not allowing you to talk is because I want your sister to learn how to care for a child and you telling her you are hungry or wet will not help her learn." Rocking you, she said. "The pacifier can be easily removed, being held in place with Velcro so, if it becomes too uncomfortable, you may remove it." You looked up at her, surprised to which she smiled. "I'm not that mean, sweetie. All I ask is that you do not talk to your sister so she can learn. If you can agree to that, I'll keep that pacifier easy to remove, okay?"

Albeit reluctantly, you nodded in agreement and removed the pacifier. "It hurts when I cry, having it in." Softly, you said.

Mom looked at the pacifier and smiled. "You are just not used to it, that's all." Gently, she said. "Try chewing on it for a short time, it'll soften it up."

"Do I have to stay gagged all the time?" Wincing, you asked.

"Just in public." Grinning, mom replied. "Unless you want the whole world to know you are a living model for baby clothing and accessories."

You blushed at that and quickly shook you head. Mom giggled then pointed to the crib. "It may look like a prison to you but the bars are there to keep a baby from accidentally rolling out of bed and injuring him or herself." She smiled. "Also, the clothing is designed to be comfortable to keep a baby happy and looking presentable."

"But why girls' clothing?" Pouting, you asked.

"You look irresistibly cute in them." Teasing, mom said. She then turned serious. "The company knows I am using you as a model and offered more money for you to model the girls' line of clothing."

"What!?..." Stunned, you asked. "I'm getting paid!?"

Mom laughed. "You didn't think I would do this to you for free; just for the fun of it, did you?" Amused, she asked. "Of course you are going to get paid for this service. If I had used real babies, I would have to compensate the baby's family."

You smiled slightly at that. Somehow, being forced to be a baby girl did not seem as bad as it did before only you had one more question. "Is the baby food and formula safe for a person my age?"

"Well, yes and no." Wincing, mom replied. "This is why you will also get real food here and there to ensure you get the proper nutrients. That and you will be checked on by a doctor every few weeks." She smiled again. "Please try not to worry. It's time for your nap... young lady."

She giggled, replacing your pacifier gag, then gently placed you into the crib and tucked you in under a warm baby blanket before leaving the room.

You wished you could tear the dress off, and return to normal life. There might be light at the end off the tunnel, but it seemed pretty far away.

Your thought train soon is interrupted by the fact that your stomach was growling rather loudly, and it made you really wish you had something to eat. You might be able to sneak away, ver getting down from the crib might be a hassle..

You get fed up with trying to fall asleep hungry. You carefully unwrap yourself from the sheets and stand up. You unlock and slide down the wall of the crib, allowing you to climb out of it. You walk down the hall, and peek into the kitchen. It looked like there was no one around, so you start walking over to the fridge to grab some food.

"What do you think you're doing?" You hear a voice say behind you. Freezing in your tracks, you turn around to see Anna standing there. She quickly picks you up and brings you back to your room. She sits down in the arm chair and sits you up on her knees. She removed your pacifier, and it felt so good to be able to talk again. "Are you crazy, Cire?"

"I just wanted to get some food" You explained.

"Well keep your voice down" Anna said. "Mom would be so mad if she found out what you did. I can't even imagine how she would punish you."

"Please don't tell her" You pleaded, tearing up.

"Don't worry, I won't. It'll be our little secret." She winked at you. "Now if you're hungry, this is what is lined up for you to eat next." She reached into a cabinet, and pulled out a bra. "Do you know what this is?"

"A bra...?" You were confused.

"It's designed to simulate breastfeeding. The cup has a compartment you can fill with milk for the baby. Think you're up for it?"

"I don't know..." This was all too crazy to you.

"Well it's this or nothing" She said. You reluctantly agreed. She removed her shirt, and her normal bra. You were surprised how open she was in front of you, but she was treating you like a baby after all. She put on the new bra, and cradled you up against her. You started sucking, and drinking the milk that came out. Somewhere in the warmth of her cuddle and the milk, you found yourself falling asleep.

Looking down at yourself, you realize you're wearing what seems to be a cow costume. It covers your entire body, except for a large opening for your butt, and another one for your balls and penis. The costume also includes a bell around your neck, and a hood for your head, with ears. Over your mouth is a muzzle, leaving only your eyes uncovered.

You try to stand up, but quickly fall down, as the costume doesn't seem to allow you to move your arms or legs far enough to stand. Speaking of your arms and legs, the ends of the costume are covered with hooves; the front ones being extended so you can walk on your feet and hands just like a cow would. A moment later, you hear someone come in.

"Hello there, Sweet Heart." says a girl's voice, with a Southern drawl. "Did the milk cow sleep well?"

As she walks into the room, your exposed cock immediately starts to spring to life. She's incredibly sexy, with her strawberry blond hair tied in braids that hand down her face, from under her cowgirl hat. Over her large, round, breasts, she wears a super tight, white, t shirt, and a denim vest. She also wears a black, shiny, thong, and a pair of brown, leather chaps, and a pair of bright red, cowboy boots.

As she walks into the stall, she carries a stool, and a bucket. You watch her thong-clad booty work as she walks over to a corner. She makes a long, slow, show of bending over to place the stool down, working her butt for you, before standing back up and turning around to sit down on the stool, with the bucket in front of her.

"Well, come on, now! Jessica don't got all day now, girl! So you just get on over here, and let me get to milkin ya!"

You stand there, on hands and feet, stunned, shocked, and hard as a rock, staring at this strange, crazy, super sexy lady in the corner. But then it hits you like a bag of bricks: Your crotch is handing down just like a cows' utters would! She wants to MILK you!"

"Come on, now!" She says, her voice now getting stern! "Don't make Jessica have to get mean with ya!" She looks over to the wall, where on, is a wooden paddle, a leather whip, a sets of taws, and an electric cattle prod! This cowgirl means BUSINESS!

You quickly asses your options.

Under normal circumstances, you'd probably be able to take this girl, but thanks to this stupid costume someone put you in last night, you're not so sure.

On the other HAND, this beautiful, sexy, cowgirl, is offering to give you a free hand job! What could be bad about THAT!?
152.title: The Milk Cow.

1522.content:
You stumble a little as you try to figure out what to do and by the time you get anywhere she is beside you with a stool on the floor and a bucket beneath you. "Now let's get you sorted shall we?"
Her grip is firm and not the most gentle in the world, starting at the base and pulling to the tip before switching hands and repeating.
"Now they say I should switch to one of them new fangled machines but I always preferred the personal touch myself, what about you Bessy?"
You don't manage to get anything out but a low moan as you start to shudder at the pressure building inside. You weren't the hottest stud around but you lasted long enough to keep everyone happy and yet within seconds your knees were buckling and you heard the splat as your cream hit the bucket. You almost collapsed as though you hand't been in months.
Eyes rolled back in your head, half closed you managed to watch as she stood and strode out fo the barn, ass swaying from side to side, liking the cream from her fingers that hadn't made it to the bucket. Before you could get your eyes open again she had gone.

154.content:
You turn your head as you blink awake and notice a rustling about your neck. Looking down, you see a brightly colored stiff ruff which you can feel the starch of on your adam's apple. Beyond the ruff, you can glimpse polka dots all over your over-sized pants, and you can feel stretchy suspenders over your shoulders holding them up. Just below everything you see is an out of focus hint of red. You come slowly to the realization that the red object is attached to your nose, and move your hand to touch it.

Your hand is huge! At least, the bright white glove covering it is, and the fingers are so puffed up with padding that you can't get a grip on anything. Prodding the bulbous red object proves your fear: You have a clown nose glued to your face. Your prodding agitated your nose, and you inhale a vague scent of pepper. Involuntarily, you sneeze and bring both hands up towards your face. You manage to stop your other hand from connecting just as you see the object within it. A fluffy shaving cream pie rests in your palm, and you nearly clobbered yourself with it.

You can't drop the pie, as it's been glued to the glove on that hand, and you can't get the gloves off either. You'll just have to be careful. With your unladen hand, you push off of your perch on the park bench and onto your feet.. which, of course, are clad in the most ungainly giant clown shoes you could ever hope never to be stuck in.

What to do now?
154.title: A Clown

choices: Sneak into the big tent.

Head out to the street.
1541.content:
As you begin to walk down the trail away from the bench wear you spent the night, you see a pair of joggers following the trail towards you. You feel somewhat inclined to duck behind something, so you won't be seen like this, but it's already too late as they've seen you as are laughing as they continue to jog. You grumble to yourself and feel your cheeks flush. When the girl jogger starts pointing and laughing at you, your resentment rises and you point right back with your pie laden hand.

The male jogger, seeing the pie point in his direction, tries to dodge to the side, and runs right into his running partner. He spins and recovers in mid-jog, but fails to see a low hanging branch that catches him on the forehead and leaves him a crumpled heap on the trail. His girlfriend, recovering from having her foot stepped on, ducks under the branch that she would have missed anyway, but trips over her boyfriend and sails face first into a patch of mud by the trail.

All this happens in the few seconds you spent pointing a pie at them. An explosive laugh escapes your lips, and you almost pie yourself when you move to catch it. Not wanting to stick around and get blamed for the mud and bruises, you make a quick march off the trail.

From here, you can see a giant red and white striped tent in the distance, a section of picnic tables behind a row of trees, and another trail leading out of the park.

Where to now?

You head towards the circus, waddling slightly due to the trousers and shoes. But you make decent enough time considering. The small children who wanted you to stop and do balloon animals for them were an annoyance but you were here now. You thought that maybe you had got really drunk and stole a clown costume last night, it didn't seem likely but you couldn't think of anything else that made any sense.
Not remembering anything of last night you quickly have to make a decision. There are people walking about between trailers, talking, moving things, you presume for another show tonight, or maybe even this after noon. Now right now nobody was giving another clown a single glance.
You could stop someone and ask for help, which would be easier or try to figure this out on your own. If you did steal this costume for some drunken reason you may have annoyed some people and they not be too happy with you waddling back in.

To the big striped tent.
15412.content:
Continuing your quick march away from the fallen joggers, you pass a row of trees and sigh relief, considering yourself out of sight and now geographically blameless for their tumble. Ahead, you catch the potentially welcome sight of a comrade in arms. That is to say, another poor fool in a clown getup is in the picnic area entertaining a group of kids.

Hoping to make a good impression so he'll help you, you saunter over to him with your pie-less hand extended to shake his, and the one with the pie hidden behind your back. Your fellow clown sees you coming and greets you like and long lost and much loved relative. Warm natures come together with a firm handshake-

*BUZZ!*

Through your glove you get a sudden jolt that runs up your arm and sets you vibrating. Something between your clasped hands is buzzing and rattling as your new clown friend bounces in place as if he too were getting shocked. When he lets go, you rub feeling back into your hand while he displays the joy buzzer in his palm to all the laughing kids. Before he can spring another joke on you, you present the problematic pie that's glued to your glove.

As you try to explain the problem, he sees the pie and jumps behind the kids, using one as a human shield as he portrays abject terror of the pie. The kids squeal with laughter and bump into each other trying to dodge the pie you aren't throwing. When you tip the pie sideways and it doesn't fall, it takes them a moment to stop hiding and realize it's stuck fast. Now the other clown sees what you were asking of him, and comes over to help you get rid of the pie.

First, he gingerly pinches the corners of the metal pan and tries to twist it out of place. The pie twists the glove, which twists your wrist, and pulls you to your knees in an accidental arm lock. The other clown helps to back up, apologizes, and brushes the dirt off your knees and shins. When he works down to shining your clown shoes, you can tell he's playing a bit, and you cross your arms and tap the shoe he isn't shining in a clear display of impatience. When he proffers his hat for a tip, you smack it out of his hands and present the still stuck pie. The kids giggle and watch with anticipation as the other clown tries once again to help you.

This time he grabs a good hold of the edges of the pie pan and yanks sharply. You are pulled off your balance and stagger forward, nearly smacking the pie into the other clown's face. He stumbles back and falls flat to avoid it, then accepts your other hand to stand back up. Wasting no time, he grabs the pie pan again, and plants one of his clown shoes against your thigh to keep you in place as he pulls.

He and you both pull to no avail, so you take a wider stance and try harder. He pulls again, and puts more pressure against your thigh until he is particularly stand sideways against you. Suddenly, he lifts his other foot and heaves. You slide your free hand under the pie hand, then lean back and lift to keep him off the ground. When his fingers slip off the pan, he flops on his back to the ground. Lifting and leaning as you were, there's no stopping the pie's upward trajectory when the other clown falls. The pie catches you right in the face as you flip backwards so far that you land land down in the pie with your clown shoes splayed out to the sides. The kids are in stitches. You feel like you might need stitches.

The need to breathe forces you to lift your face out of the creamy mess. The stagger to your feet, stumble blindly for a moment, wipe your eyes, and walk away, still dripping shaving cream from your chin and clown nose. A minute goes by before you even notice that the pie pan finally fell off of your glove.

Where do you go now?
15412.title: Look for help at the picnic tables.

1543.content:
You resolve to get free of your costume.

First, you try to remove your glove. Keeping the one with the pie in it at arm's length, you bite down on the middle finger of your other glove and try to pull your hand out of it. It won't budge. You tug and tug, but you feel like it's either been tied on at the wrist, or glued in place. You try biting the other fingers and tugging with a continued lack of effect. You bite the thumb of the glove.. and taste a bit of glue. Now your mouth is stuck, and you look like you're sucking your thumb. A passing pair of ladies laugh at you, and make a half heard comment about a "big baby."

Try as you might, you can't tug your glove from your mouth, but you spy a signpost in the park and get an idea. At the signpost, you're in view of some picnickers, but you ignore them as you wrap your fingers around the post and lean back away from it. Jerking, twisting and leaning, you feel your lips losing their hold on your thumb, and you redouble your efforts.

Suddenly, your lips part, and you fly back, away from the signpost. You lose your grip on the post and spin out of control on your stumbling clown shoes.

*WACK*

Your forehead smacks into a tree branch, and you drop like a multicolored sack of bricks, flat on your back. Dazed, you sit up and touch your injured noggin. The world goes white, and you can hear the picnickers laughing at you. You just smacked your forgotten pie into your own face.

Dripping globs of shaving cream from your plastered clown nose, you stagger back onto your clown shoes, rip the empty pie tin from your glove using your teeth, and march off in anger as people continue to guffaw at your predicament.

Where do you go?
1543.title: Try to take the costume off.

1551.content:
You feel the cold straight away and you suspect you might be naked, at least from the waist down. Instead you open your eyes to find yourself wearing thin, nude, shimmering pantyhose from waist to toe. Your top half is a bit better, covered as it is in a grey jacket, open quite wide at the front, that ran from your waist down and over your hands. These ends are shaped to look like cute paws and though they won't stop you grabbing anything they are a little troublesome. You try to close this jacket up, but struggle to make any progress and stop before you rip it, no matter what you think this may be better than nothing. There is no reflective surface but you can feel the cold paint on your nose of at least that if not more, no doubt considering your get up at least some whiskers you think there may be more but at the moment it is difficult to tell.
You lift your sleeve covered hands up to give your face a wipe and manage to knock the twin structures on top of your head. These take a few minutes to work out but you soon believe them to be your hair, sprayed, waxed and moulded into two giant mouse ears, quite flat and close to the size of your head each. You didn't think you had that much hair but there they are all the same. You sit down dismayed and find the last piece of the costume, your tail, think and grey and apparently joined to your top. You give it a tug but it doesn't move and you can't bring yourself to care. Your head hurts, the light seems a little too bright, thought you suspect that it is to do with your head rather than the lights themselves, and you have no idea where you are.
You had woken up in some strange places before, bars, fields, tied to a lamp post but this was a new one. The room you were in was completely grey, a dull bland kind of grey. The roof seemed to be wire with light above shining down to make it difficult to tell. The floor was the same as the walls. You tried to stand up and slipped a little on your daintily covered feet, you had to use your "paws" to steady yourself though you refused to stay hunched and stood erect even though this seemed a little cramped considering the height of the room. Especially given your new "ears" you could just about stand up right but the door ways were a different matter. For there were doors, two of them, one leading left and the other right.
"Hello?" you called out.
No answer. Of course.
With no other idea and no wishing to sit here forever you set off

Hello everyone. This will be my first story on this site and I hope you like it.

I would also like to thank anyone who decides to add to this story in advance.

I do have a few rules for anyone looking to add which are:

No sex in any form
No physical change of transformation to the main character (things like tattoo's are allowed though)
No mental change to the character (like mental regression and such)

and the most important rule is that you must have fun while writing the add on :)
